name: Space Dice are Invading In a Weirdly Specific Manner
name_original: Space Dice are Invading In a Weirdly Specific Manner
description:
The alien dice have made their way to us, but we will try to protect ourselves no matter the cost!

The goal of the game is to rack up a highscore using the random weapons dropped by the dice. You have to be precise, as you get more points for defeating them in a specific way...
